amarikanu rahas oththu sewaya wisin wiwidha ratawala gatalu athi kirima sandaha yodawa gath siwil samaja ki්rayakarikayan athara chathura senarathna da sitina bawath, 2004 wasare thaman waidya shishyayekuwa sitiyadi ‘shishya nayakayin saha samaja wagakim’ yana mayen ema wasare sapthambar 27 saha okthobar 15 athara dinawala amarika eksath janapadaye heli nokala sthanayaka pawath wu wadamuluwata chathura senarathna nirdesha kala bawath, ema nirdeshaya amarikanu eejanthayan gen sadumlath mandalaye purna anumathiya labunu bawath dakwena kebal paniwidaya, supa්rasiddha "wikiliks" web adawiya mangin anawaranaya kara thibini.

hitapu brasila janapathi lulata pilikawak hitapu brasila janapathi lulada silwa mahathata pilikawak walandi athi bawa heliwa thibe. 66 hawiridi hitapu janapathiwarayage ugure mema pilikawa hatagena atha. 2002 wasaredi balayata pathwu silwa mahatha wasara 50 kata pasuwa erata palanaya kala prathama wamanshika janapathiwarayaya. 2010 marthu masaya wana thekma lula mahatha adhika lesa dumwati panaya kara atha.

hapa kana minimaru ballek wenna mata thibba nam kiyala mama hithuwa.awurudu haye indan dasaya wenakam amma panala marunu kochchiyatama panala umbaa marenna salasum karaddi, muhude gilila hari wena mona kramekin hari marenna salasum karaddi saththayi umbae duka beda ganna umbaa ekka ekathu wela marenna thibba nam kiyala mamath hithuwa.aththamayi ridi nimnaye kusala wenuwen, andawadakaya hi pethaෲs wenuwen, pirunu hadakhi kusum wenuwen, yahalu yehelihi indrarathna wenuwen, karnalge birindawaruhi karnal chulabhaya wenuwen, apuge lokaye apu wenuwen, aranakata pembandahi arasarana minissu wenuwen me okkoma wenuwen kampa unata wadiya umbaa gana mama kampa una.
